predicate.note: Frames file for 'defer' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Relative Time. Comparison with 'delay'.

roleset.name: put off until a later time

role.descr: delay itself, EXT, or new time

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The company is highlighting more special deals in its advertising and stores, and it's offering *trace* to defer finance charges on certain big-ticket items.
example.arg: finance charges on certain big-ticket items

example.name: passive with new time
example.text: Although the company could see fourth-quarter revenue shrink by nearly $5 billion if it isn't able to deliver any more planes this year, those dollars actually would just be deferred *trace* until 1990.
example.arg: Although the company could see fourth-quarter revenue shrink by nearly $5 billion if it isn't able to deliver any more planes this year

roleset.note: Ignore adjectival usages like "some deferred payments".
